thread.title: Udoh: Enyimba Must Beat 3SC In Aba
thread.title_full: Udoh: Enyimba Must Beat 3SC In Aba

author: Prince Imehiron
title: Udoh: Enyimba Must Beat 3SC In Aba
text:
Headlines , Nigeria League 
By Adeboye Amosu: 
Enyimba striker Mfon Udoh has told Completesportsnigeria.com that his side must beat Shooting Stars on Sunday to stay in contention for a record seventh Glo Premier League title. 
The Peoples Elephant had their lead at the top of the log reduced to three points following a 2-1 defeat against Oriental rivals, Heartland, last weekend. 
They will look to bounce back from that defeat when they host 3SC at the Enyimba Sports Stadium on Sunday. 
Udoh who scored 23 goals to top the scorers' chart last term told Completesportsnigeria.com that they will go all out for a win against the Ibadan-based outfit. 
"We have no choice than to beat 3SC at home on Sunday as that is the only result that can help our ambition of lifting the title," Udoh said. 
"We are still in a good position to win the title despite the defeat against Heartland last weekend and we must avoid a repeat of that result this weekend. 
"It's going to be a tough game, but I believe we have a squad strong enough to beat 3SC." 
The reverse fixture between both sides earlier in the season in Ibadan ended in a barren draw.
